articles.title: DCF closed the case on a Worcester family. A year later, a 4-year-old was dead.
articles.description:
A'zella Ortiz, 4, was allegedly killed by her father after years of "chronic and cumulative" neglect. DCF thought they were in New York.

The post DCF closed the case on a Worcester family. A year later, a 4-year-old was dead. appeared first on Boston.com.
